title: Teamfight Tactics Showdown Roster and Prizes

replies.body: Should be 64 of the best players not streamers as half these players are quite amature at tft, which will make for a shorter more boring watch than if it was 64 of the best players or idek 32 best players in there own bracket and 32 steamers in another but anyways just venting as it seems skill is no longer a requirement, which makes for better viewing <3
Yassuo looks like he was chucked in last minute.
will there be a vod for this, as i cant watch it live at 2am...
Too busy flaming riot for giving him bad tft rng.

Hello fellow tacticians,

Definitely understand the sentiment here - the format and prize pool etc are part of the process of making a 'twitch rivals' official event. We know they aren't necessarily the best players - so we will look at what we can do to serve this need too in a different way. Thanks for sharing your thoughts on the matter - it does give us an insight as to how these types of events feel for competitive players.

Cheers

Should definitely be best players featuring select streamers, not a full squad of streamers only? Would've preferred to see you guys give back to members of the community that aren't paid thousands of dollars in donations daily.
